name: Fiss the Elf's Puzzling Pin-Ups
description:
Get in Santa’s Pants 3 won’t be ready this year, I’m sorry. Instead, you get to receive the gift of the dreaded spin-off puzzle game! Solve puzzles to unlock new artwork of everybody’s favourite blue-haired elf [citation needed].

The game contains suggestive themes and imagery.

Designed for and coded in the Pico-8 fantasy console.
